name: HTML5
description: HTML5 is a markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web

features.title: Markup language
features.description: It is a markup language, so it provides a flexible way to design web pages along with the text.

features.title: Platform-independent
features.description: It is platform-independent because it can be displayed on any platform like Windows, Linux, and Macintosh, etc.
